column2: Google Services operating income increased 13.2 billion from 2022 to 2023. The increase in operating income

column1: was  primarily  driven  by  an  increase  in  revenues  partially  offset  by  an  increase  in  content  acquisition  costs  and

reduction in costs driven by the change in the estimated useful lives of our servers and certain network equipment.
